**EXPERIENCE** Hesitant and Curious Interested but slighlty overwhelmed. Hopeful but slighlty nervous. Inspired and connected Commited and joyful 

**BUSINESS GOALS** 

Increase awareness of Temple.Increase website/social media visits.   
Increase event engagement.Deliver high quality experiences, especially for 

first timers. 

Increase repeat attendance and retention. 

**KPI’S** Website traffic, social media visits. 

**RESPONSIBLE** 

Time on site, event page visits. 

Registrations, SMS opt ins. Event attendance rates, feedback score. 

Repeat attendance % and whatsApp subscribers. 

**TEAMS**Marketing Website design \+ marketing Marketing \+ Admin Volunteer coordinatiors and event leads.   
Marketing team \+ CRM 

**PAINPOINTS**   
Website not optimized for new comers, unclear messaging to new users. 

Event details unclear, too much information. 

Long Registration From, No reassurance messages. 

No personal greetings, Confusion about seating. 

No structured follow up, inconsistent communication. 

details.Anxiety about attending alone.No follow up leading to   
**DROP OFF** 

**RISKS** 

**OPPORTUNITIES**   
Leaves website within 10 seconds 

SEO for“Hindu temple near me”, clear navigation for new users.   
Overwhelmed by too many 

Add “New Here?”section with FAQ \+ short welcome video 

Simple registration form, automated reminder messages. 

Feeling unnoticed and disconnected. 

QR checkins, pairing new comers with loyal attendees. 

forgetting about the temple. 

Consistent emails: Thank you → Upcoming event → Community invite   
**User Journey Map:** Online content consumer → donor → major donor

**Loyalty & Advocacy**

**EXPERIENCE**   
Inspired and uplifted Interested but cautious Hopeful but evaluating trust Connected and valued Committed and proud 

**BUSINESS GOALS**   
Increasing online reach and social media followers.   
Increase visitation of donation pages.

**RESPONSIBLE** 

Email sign ups and donation link views 

Conversion rate \+ Average donation amount. 

% of repeat donation Reccuring donors, major donations.

**PAINPOINTS**Content being disconnected to the mission and impact. 

No clear indication of where donations will end up. 

Complicated and long donation/payment process. 

No confirmation/folllow up after donation.   
Lack of personalized communications for larger/consistent donors. 

transparency.Abandoning donation forms.Moving support to a different   
**DROP OFF RISKS**   
Scrolling past content Lack of trust with donation 

Feeling like“just another donor.” 

yet similar temple. 

**OPPORTUNITIES**   
Add stronger messaging in video and content. Include Donate/Join in majority 

Show a clear impact landing page with touching visuals. 

Simple donation forms and optional reccuring payments. 

Automated messages to Thank donors and follow up with Impact/results. 

Personalized outreaching, recognizing donors, appreciation events etc...   
**User Journey Map:** Volunteer signup → active volunteer → event coordinator 

**Awareness Consideration Decision Event Experience**   
**Loyalty & Advocacy** 

**CUSTOMER ACTIVITIES** 

**CUSTOMER GOALS** 

**TOUCHPOINTS**   
Sees call for volunteers through social media/website. 

Finding a meaningful way to serve the community. 

Social Media, WhatsApp, In person announcements, and 

Reads the information, asks questions if applicable and fills out the interest form. 

Understanding responsibilities/time commitment. 

Website(Volunteer Page), 

FAQ, direct messaging or in 

Signs up for first volunteer shift. 

Feeling confident during first shift. 

Volunteer sign up form \+ confirmation message 

Assits at the event, interacts with the team. 

Feeling useful, welcomed and appreciated. 

WhatsApp volunteer group, in person briefings and check   
Signs up for recurring shifts, mentors others and gets promoted to event lead. 

Growing in their role and contributing long term. 

Recognition messages \+ Leadershup meetings and

**EXPERIENCE**

Increasing first time volunteer participation. 

Delivering organized event operations.   
Developing reliable and commited event leaders.

**TEAMS**Marketing \+ Event Outreach Marketing \+ Volunteer 

Volunteer Satisfaction submissions.

coordinatorVolunteer CoordinatorEvent Leads \+ Volunteer Coordinator   
coordinator

Unclear time commitments \+ expectations. 

Lack of confirmation and reminders. 

Unclear direction with roles during events and shifts.

Ignoring call for volunteer. Incimplete interest forms Signing up but bailing.Stop signing up due to burn Feeling disorganized during   
**RISKS**

Clear role descriptions.Automated confirmation messages \+ reminders. 

first shift. 

QR checkin and task assigning system.   
out.
